ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | subrgvr1.x | |- X = ( var1 ` R ) |

| 3 |  | subrgvr1.h | |- H = ( R |`s T ) |
| 4 |  | subrgvr1cl.u | |- U = ( Poly1 ` H ) |
| 5 |  | subrgvr1cl.b | |- B = ( Base ` U ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_vr1val | |- X = ( ( 1o mVar R ) ` (/) ) |

| 9 | 8 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> 1o e. On ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1o mPoly H ) = ( 1o mPoly H ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( PwSer1 ` H ) = ( PwSer1 ` H ) |
| 12 | 4, 11, 5 | #P_ply1bas | |- B = ( Base ` ( 1o mPoly H ) ) |
| 13 | 7, 9, 2, 3, 10, 12 | #P_subrgmvrf | |- ( ph -> ( 1o mVar R ) : 1o --> B ) |
| 14 |  | #P_0lt1o | |- (/) e. 1o |

| 17 | 6, 16 | #P_syl5eqel | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
